Text:
Got this from an uploading site, you'll see the corrupted photo at page 137. As you may expect, only B&W pictures.

If you like photography history/histories, there is some interesting chronicles at
http://www.lensrentals.com/blog/category/photography/history

You might start reading this, as a taste:
http://www.lensrentals.com/blog/2012/10/politicians-pork-and-photographers

Enjoy
